stories.text:
I find it perplexing to see how Ukraine politicians literally order companies and leadership in other countries to do this and that to harm Russia.

Why should a third country or company or submit to their requests to harm Russia just because Ukraine wanted to join EU?

I Amy find Russian politics unaligned to western view. But by no means I consider them as strange aliens, they are not an enemy. As a matter of fact I see two foreign countries in conflict.
stories.title: Ask HN: Why are Ukrain leaders taking the west for granted?

stories.text: Hey, looking to incorporate an SEO feature in our SaaS, to give our customers a way to audit websites by inputing URL and getting an Ahrefs/Semrush type of audit with DA, trafic and other metrics.

stories.text: Hey fellow coders in Russia. What is it like to live in Russia right now? How are you informed about the news? How much has changed in the everyday life? Please share your thoughts. Thanks!
